interface.name: udev_domtrans
interface.summary: Execute udev in the udev domain.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: udev_helper_domtrans
interface.summary: Execute a udev helper in the udev domain.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: udev_read_state
interface.summary: Allow process to read udev process state.

interface.name: udev_dontaudit_use_fds
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to inherit a udev file descriptor.

interface.name: udev_dontaudit_rw_dgram_sockets
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to read or write to a udev unix datagram socket.

interface.name: udev_read_db
interface.summary: Allow process to read list of devices.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: udev_rw_db
interface.summary: Allow process to modify list of devices.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.
